original_text: He shall calculate with his buyer from the year when he sold himself to him until the year of jubilee, and the price of his sale shall vary with the number of years. The time he was with his owner shall be rated as the time of a hired worker.
korean_text: 자기 몸이 팔린 해로부터 희년까지를 그 산 자와 계산하여 그 연수를 따라서 그 몸의 값을 정할 때에 그 사람을 섬긴 날을 그 사람에게 고용된 날로 여길 것이라

sentences.original_text: He shall calculate with his buyer
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기를 산 사람과 계산해야 한다

sentences.original_text: from the year when he sold himself to him
and the price of his sale
shall vary with the number of years.
The time he was with his owner
shall be rated as the time of a hired worker.
